about_the_game:
Dive into the intricate world of electricity in electrobillion, an educational simulation that unveils the hidden complexity of our power infrastructure. As you manage production, distribution, and consumption, you'll discover the delicate balance between cities, industries, markets, and nature.

Key Features:

  • Simulate real-world power systems.
  • Balance economic growth with environmental concerns.
  • Explore the interconnections between electricity and modern life.
  • Make impactful decisions that shape your virtual world's future.

Experience the challenges of powering our civilization while learning about sustainable practices in this engaging journey through the electrified landscape of the Anthropocene.
